project.name: Are you sure you're hungry?
project.desc: An exercise in pictograms and signs. One of my New Year's resolution is to be more concious of when and how much I eat. This sign was designed to remind me of my resolution and ensure I was eating cause my body needed to refuel. It is now a big magnet on my fridge.
project.imgalt: sign asking if you're really hungry

project.name: pirate arrggregator
project.desc: How good is your spy eye? Try arrggregating as many pirates as you can in this dynamic game. This app was build with Javascript, jQuery, raphael.js, underscore.js, sinatra, HTML5, and CSS3.

project.name: screen test
project.desc: A ruby on rails student project that analyzes a user's personality and world view based on their favorite movies. This app was built with jQuery, jQuery UI, Chart.js, underscore.js, textillate.js, OMDB API, Rotten Tomatoes API, uClassify API, HTML5, and CSS3.
